Sentencas: The present study investigates the temperature-structure-stoichiometry relationship of a promising oxygen electrode SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-delta over a temperature (T) range from room temperature (RT) to 900 degrees C.
Titulo: A Combined Variable-Temperature Neutron Diffraction and Thermogravimetric Analysis Study on a Promising Oxygen Electrode, SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ, for Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The techniques employed are variable-temperature neutron diffraction (VTND) and thermogravimetric analysis (TGA).
Titulo: A Combined Variable-Temperature Neutron Diffraction and Thermogravimetric Analysis Study on a Promising Oxygen Electrode, SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ, for Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: At T < 75 degrees C, VTND reveals a tetragonal (P4/mmm) structure with a G-type magnetic ordering.
Titulo: A Combined Variable-Temperature Neutron Diffraction and Thermogravimetric Analysis Study on a Promising Oxygen Electrode, SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ, for Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Above 75 degrees C, the nucleus structure remains the same, while the magnetic ordering disappears.
Titulo: A Combined Variable-Temperature Neutron Diffraction and Thermogravimetric Analysis Study on a Promising Oxygen Electrode, SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ, for Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A phase transition from tetragonal (P4/mmm) to cubic (Pm (3) over barm) is observed at 412 degrees C, where the two Co sites and three O sites in the P4/mmm phase converge to one equivalent site, respectively.
Titulo: A Combined Variable-Temperature Neutron Diffraction and Thermogravimetric Analysis Study on a Promising Oxygen Electrode, SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ, for Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The phase transition temperature coincides with the peak temperature of oxygen uptake obtained by TGA.
Titulo: A Combined Variable-Temperature Neutron Diffraction and Thermogravimetric Analysis Study on a Promising Oxygen Electrode, SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ, for Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: It is also observed that the Nb dopant has no preferred Co site to occupy.
Titulo: A Combined Variable-Temperature Neutron Diffraction and Thermogravimetric Analysis Study on a Promising Oxygen Electrode, SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ, for Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The oxygen vacancies are mostly located at the O3 site surrounding the Co2 site in the P4/mmm structure.
Titulo: A Combined Variable-Temperature Neutron Diffraction and Thermogravimetric Analysis Study on a Promising Oxygen Electrode, SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ, for Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The intermediate-spin state of Co3+ at the Co2 site is responsible for the observed distortions of CoO6 octahedra, i.e., elongation of Co2O(6) octahedra and shortening of Co1O(6) octahedra along the c-axis, which is a phenomenon known as Jahn-Teller distortion.
Titulo: A Combined Variable-Temperature Neutron Diffraction and Thermogravimetric Analysis Study on a Promising Oxygen Electrode, SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ, for Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: At high temperatures, large thermal displacement factor for O2- is observed with high of oxygen vacancies, providing a structural environment favorable to high O2- conductivity in Nb-doped SrCoO3-based oxygen electrode materials.
Titulo: A Combined Variable-Temperature Neutron Diffraction and Thermogravimetric Analysis Study on a Promising Oxygen Electrode, SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ, for Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
A Combined Variable-Temperature Neutron Diffraction and Thermogravimetric Analysis Study on a Promising Oxygen Electrode, SrCo0.9Nb0.1O3-δ, for Reversible Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
